availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Webster County, Kentucky, farmer. North Carolina native. Married to Martha Rupell Hawkins in Caswell County, North Carolina, in May 1843. Father of Susan Hawkins, John Hawkins, and Henry Hawkins. Married to Nancy Hawkins. Father of Mary Hawkins, William Hawkins, Burton Hawkins, and George Hawkins. Farmer in Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Webster County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, District 2, p. 138A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Webster County, p. 613.
North Carolina County Registers of Deeds, North Carolina State Archives, Raleigh, North Carolina, Caswell County Marriage Bonds, RG 048.
